promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple deer fighting-type pokemon wearing dark armor. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ruinostag, a a massive simple deer fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Reply Strongly. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "fighting" or "Ruinostag". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, deer-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Behemoth of the old world, Ruinostag masters martial prowess. Known to dwell in relic-laden landscapes, it responds mightily to any threat.
